00078 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00079 /// The Ethercat Master is managing the whole ethercat communication 
00080 /// It have to be a singleton in the system
00081 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00082 class EthercatMaster {
00083 friend class YouBotJoint;
00084 friend class YouBotGripper;
00085 friend class YouBotGripperBar;
00086   private:
00087     static EthercatMaster* instance;
00088 
00089     EthercatMaster();
00090 
00091     EthercatMaster(const EthercatMaster& ) {};
00092 
00093     ~EthercatMaster();
00094 
00095 
00096   public:
00097     ///creates a instance of the singleton EthercatMaster if there is none and returns a reference to it
00098     ///@param configFile configuration file name incl. the extension
00099     ///@param configFilePath the path where the configuration is located with a / at the end
00100     static EthercatMaster& getInstance(const std::string configFile = "youbot-ethercat.cfg", const std::string configFilePath = "../config/");
00101 
00102     /// destroy the singleton instance by calling the destructor
00103     static void destroy();
00104

00106     unsigned int getNumberOfSlaves() const;
00107

00115 
00116     ///sends ethercat messages to the motor controllers
00117     /// returns a true if everything it OK and returns false if something fail
00118     bool sendProcessData();
00119 
00120     /// receives ethercat messages from the motor controllers
00121     /// returns a true if everything it OK and returns false if something fail
00122     bool receiveProcessData();
00123 
00124     /// checks if an error has occurred in the soem driver
00125     /// returns a true if an error has occurred

00135     ///closes the ethercat connection
